an ongoing exit, resetting the coin to not-exited.","params":{"slot":"The slot of the coin being reset"}},"challengeAfter(uint64,bytes,bytes,bytes,uint256)":{"details":"Allows a user to challenge an exit, by providing a direct spend, in order to prevent the exit of an unauthorized token.","params":{"blockNumber":"BlockNumber of the transaction to be checked for the inclusion proof","proof":"Bytes needed for the proof of inclusion of txBytes in the Plasma block","signature":"Signature of the txBytes proving the validity of it.","slot":"The slot to be challenged","txBytes":"RLP encoded bytes of the transaction to make a Challenge After. See CheckAfter for conditions."}},"challengeBefore(uint64,bytes,bytes,uint256)":{"details":"Allows a user to create a Plasma Challenge targeting an exit in order to prevent the use of unauthorized tokens.     A plasma challenge is any previous transaction of the token that must be proved invalid by a direct spend of it.","params":{"blockNumber":"BlockNumber of the transaction to be checked for the inclusion proof","proof":"Bytes needed for the proof of inclusion of txBytes in the Plasma block","slot":"The slot to be challenged","txBytes":"RLP encoded bytes of the transaction to make a Challenge Before. See CheckBefore for conditions."}},"challengeBetween(uint64,bytes,bytes,bytes,uint256)":{"details":"Allows a user to challenge an exit, by providing a previous double spend, in order to prevent the exit of an unauthorized token.","params":{"blockNumber":"BlockNumber of the transaction to be checked for the inclusion proof","proof":"Bytes needed for the proof of inclusion of txBytes in the Plasma block","signature":"Signature of the txBytes proving the validity of it.","slot":"The slot to be challenged","txBytes":"RLP encoded bytes of the transaction to make a Challenge Between. See CheckBetween for conditions."}},"checkBothIncludedAndSigned(bytes,bytes,bytes,bytes,bytes,uint256[2])":{"details":"Verifies that consecutive two transaction involving the same coin are valid","params":{"blocks":"An array of two block numbers, at index 0, the block containing the prevTx and at index 1, the block containing       the exitingTx","exitingTxBytes":"The RLP-encoded transaction involving a coin which an exiting owner of the coin claims to be the latest","exitingTxInclusionProof":"An inclusion proof of exitingTx","prevTxBytes":"The RLP-encoded transaction involving a coin which took place directly before exitingTxBytes","prevTxInclusionProof":"An inclusion proof of prevTx","signature":"The signature of the exitingTxBytes by the coin owner indicated in prevTx."}},"finalizeExit(uint64)":{"details":"Finalizes an exit, i.e. puts the exiting coin into the EXITED state and withdraws it,     provided the exit has matured and has not been successfully challenged, else if a challenge is present,     resets the coin and awards the challenger with the bond.","params":{"slot":"The slot of the coin being exited"}},"respondChallengeBefore(uint64,bytes32,uint256,bytes,bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Allows a user to respond to a Plasma Challenge targeting a funded channel's exit. For validity go to CheckResponse","params":{"challengingTxHash":"Hash of the transaction being challenged with.","proof":"Bytes needed for the proof of inclusion of respondingTransaction in the Plasma block","respondingBlockNumber":"BlockNumber of the respondingTransaction to be checked for the inclusion proof.","respondingTransaction":"Transaction signed by the challengingTxHash owner showing a spent","signature":"Signature of the respondingTransaction to prove its validity","slot":"The slot to be challenged"}},"startDepositExit(uint64)":{"details":"Allows and exit of a deposit transaction","params":{"slot":"The slot of the coin being exited"}},"startExit(uint64,bytes,bytes,bytes,bytes,bytes,uint256[2])":{"details":"Allows and exit of a non-deposit transaction. See `checkBothIncludedAndSigned` for conditions","params":{"blocks":"The blocks (array of size 2) corresponding to prevTxBytes and exitingTxBytes in that order                               to validate their correct inclusion","exitingTxBytes":"The bytes transaction to be exited. Needs to be the last valid transaction of the                               slot in order not to be able to be challenged. Owner of it must be msg.sender.","exitingTxInclusionProof":"An inclusion proof of `exitingTxBytes`","prevTxBytes":"The bytes corresponding to the immediate previous transaction to exitingTxBytes.","prevTxInclusionProof":"An inclusion proof of `prevTxBytes`","signature":"Signature of exitingTxBytes. Must be signed by the recipient of prevTxBytes.","slot":"The slot of the coin being exited"}},"submitBlock(uint256,bytes32)":{"details":"called by a Validator to append a Plasma block to the Plasma chain","params":{"blockNumber":"Number of the block to submit","root":"The transaction root hash of the Plasma block being added"}},"submitSecretBlock(uint256,bytes32)":{"details":"called by a Validator to append a Secret Revealing Plasma block to the Plasma chain. It has to be withing     SECRET_REVEALING_PERIOD from the submission of the blockNumber block.","params":{"blockNumber":"Number of the block corresponding to this secretBlock","root":"The transaction root hash of the Plasma block being added"}}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"cancelExit(uint64)":{"notice":"Emits CoinReset event"},"challengeAfter(uint64,bytes,bytes,bytes,uint256)":{"notice":"Emits CoinReset eventSets coin's state to NOT_EXITING"},"challengeBefore(uint64,bytes,bytes,uint256)":{"notice":"Pushes a ChallengeLib.Challenge to challengesEmits ChallengedExit eventA bond must be locked to prevent unlawful challenges. If the challenge is not answered, the bond is returned."},"challengeBetween(uint64,bytes,bytes,bytes,uint256)":{"notice":"Emits CoinReset eventSets coin's state to NOT_EXITING"},"checkBothIncludedAndSigned(bytes,bytes,bytes,bytes,bytes,uint256[2])":{"notice":"If exitingTxBytes corresponds to a deposit transaction, this function fails"},"finalizeExit(uint64)":{"notice":"Changes coin's state to EXITEDEmits FinalizedExit event if no challenges are presentEmits Withdrew event if no challenges are presentEmits CoinReset event if there are challenges present"},"getPlasmaCoin(uint64)":{"notice":"//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// /   Getters cancelExit(uint64).details: Cancels an ongoing exit, resetting the coin to not-exited.

params.slot: The slot of the coin being reset

challengeAfter(uint64,bytes,bytes,bytes,.details: Allows a user to challenge an exit, by providing a direct spend, in order to prevent the exit of an unauthorized token.

params.blockNumber: BlockNumber of the transaction to be checked for the inclusion proof
params.proof: Bytes needed for the proof of inclusion of txBytes in the Plasma block
params.signature: Signature of the txBytes proving the validity of it.
params.txBytes: RLP encoded bytes of the transaction to make a Challenge After. See CheckAfter for conditions.

challengeBefore(uint64,bytes,bytes,uint2.details: Allows a user to create a Plasma Challenge targeting an exit in order to prevent the use of unauthorized tokens.     A plasma challenge is any previous transaction of the token that must be proved invalid by a direct spend of it.

params.blockNumber: BlockNumber of the transaction to be checked for the inclusion proof
params.proof: Bytes needed for the proof of inclusion of txBytes in the Plasma block
params.txBytes: RLP encoded bytes of the transaction to make a Challenge Before. See CheckBefore for conditions.

challengeBetween(uint64,bytes,bytes,byte.details: Allows a user to challenge an exit, by providing a previous double spend, in order to prevent the exit of an unauthorized token.

params.blockNumber: BlockNumber of the transaction to be checked for the inclusion proof
params.proof: Bytes needed for the proof of inclusion of txBytes in the Plasma block
params.signature: Signature of the txBytes proving the validity of it.
params.txBytes: RLP encoded bytes of the transaction to make a Challenge Between. See CheckBetween for conditions.

checkBothIncludedAndSigned(bytes,bytes,b.details: Verifies that consecutive two transaction involving the same coin are valid

params.blocks: An array of two block numbers, at index 0, the block containing the prevTx and at index 1, the block containing       the exitingTx
params.exitingTxBytes: The RLP-encoded transaction involving a coin which an exiting owner of the coin claims to be the latest
params.prevTxBytes: The RLP-encoded transaction involving a coin which took place directly before exitingTxBytes
params.signature: The signature of the exitingTxBytes by the coin owner indicated in prevTx.

finalizeExit(uint64).details: Finalizes an exit, i.e. puts the exiting coin into the EXITED state and withdraws it,     provided the exit has matured and has not been successfully challenged, else if a challenge is present,     resets the coin and awards the challenger with the bond.

params.slot: The slot of the coin being exited

respondChallengeBefore(uint64,bytes32,ui.details: Allows a user to respond to a Plasma Challenge targeting a funded channel's exit. For validity go to CheckResponse

params.challengingTxHash: Hash of the transaction being challenged with.
params.proof: Bytes needed for the proof of inclusion of respondingTransaction in the Plasma block
params.respondingBlockNumber: BlockNumber of the respondingTransaction to be checked for the inclusion proof.
params.respondingTransaction: Transaction signed by the challengingTxHash owner showing a spent
params.signature: Signature of the respondingTransaction to prove its validity

startDepositExit(uint64).details: Allows and exit of a deposit transaction

params.slot: The slot of the coin being exited

startExit(uint64,bytes,bytes,bytes,bytes.details: Allows and exit of a non-deposit transaction. See `checkBothIncludedAndSigned` for conditions

params.blocks: The blocks (array of size 2) corresponding to prevTxBytes and exitingTxBytes in that order                               to validate their correct inclusion
params.exitingTxBytes: The bytes transaction to be exited. Needs to be the last valid transaction of the                               slot in order not to be able to be challenged. Owner of it must be msg.sender.
params.prevTxBytes: The bytes corresponding to the immediate previous transaction to exitingTxBytes.
params.signature: Signature of exitingTxBytes. Must be signed by the recipient of prevTxBytes.
params.slot: The slot of the coin being exited

submitBlock(uint256,bytes32).details: called by a Validator to append a Plasma block to the Plasma chain

params.blockNumber: Number of the block to submit
params.root: The transaction root hash of the Plasma block being added

submitSecretBlock(uint256,bytes32).details: called by a Validator to append a Secret Revealing Plasma block to the Plasma chain. It has to be withing     SECRET_REVEALING_PERIOD from the submission of the blockNumber block.

params.blockNumber: Number of the block corresponding to this secretBlock
params.root: The transaction root hash of the Plasma block being added

challengeAfter(uint64,bytes,bytes,bytes,.notice: Emits CoinReset eventSets coin's state to NOT_EXITING

challengeBefore(uint64,bytes,bytes,uint2.notice: Pushes a ChallengeLib.Challenge to challengesEmits ChallengedExit eventA bond must be locked to prevent unlawful challenges. If the challenge is not answered, the bond is returned.

challengeBetween(uint64,bytes,bytes,byte.notice: Emits CoinReset eventSets coin's state to NOT_EXITING

checkBothIncludedAndSigned(bytes,bytes,b.notice: If exitingTxBytes corresponds to a deposit transaction, this function fails

finalizeExit(uint64).notice: Changes coin's state to EXITEDEmits FinalizedExit event if no challenges are presentEmits Withdrew event if no challenges are presentEmits CoinReset event if there are challenges present

respondChallengeBefore(uint64,bytes32,ui.notice: Removes a ChallengeLib.Challenge to challengesEmits RespondedExitChallenge eventThe bond is given to the responder.

startExit(uint64,bytes,bytes,bytes,bytes.notice: Emits StartedExit eventmust be bonded with BOND_AMOUNT
